description: [Astaroth](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0373) uses [certutil](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0160) and [BITSAdmin](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0190) to download additional malware. (Citation: Cofense Astaroth Sept 2018)(Citation: Cybereason Astaroth Feb 2019)(Citation: Securelist Brazilian Banking Malware July 2020)
